subject: Re: checking for test coverage
msgSnippet: ... I do not know of a freeware or shareware utility such as this yet.  JProbe and OptimizeIt are both commercial products that can perform code coverage
messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 4 Feb 2002 22:56:15 -0800
> From: Chris Eppstein <ceppstein@...>
> Subject: checking for test coverage
>
> Does anyone know of any utilities that can check for test coverage. This
> could be a simple as an Ant task or maybe a more complicated plug-in for
> JUnit or even a stand alone utility. Any ideas? I'd like to not re-invent
> the wheel if something like this exists already.

I do not know of a freeware or shareware utility such as this yet. JProbe and
OptimizeIt are both commercial products that can perform code coverage measurements.
I have used JProbe successfully with JUnit code. It's much more interesting
integrating it with Ant to automate the whole process, but that is not necessary.

-Steve :)
